title: Himi 62
lyrics:
4-6s & 2-8s
1.
’Oku monū’ia
‘A e kau pekia,
‘Oku nau pekia
‘I honau ‘Otua;
He ‘oku ngata mei ai
‘Oku nau fiemālie.
2.
’Oku nau malōlō
‘I he’enau ngāue,
Pea te nau utu
Hono fua lelei;
‘I he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Eiki,
Na’a nau tokanga ki ai.
3.
Kuo fakaongo
Mei he langi na,
‘A e tala lelei
Kia kinautolu;
Pea fakapapau ia
‘E he Laumālie tapu.
4.
Tau fiemālie
‘I he’etau ‘ilo,
‘A hono ‘uhinga
‘O ‘etau pekia;
Pea ke tau ‘ia Sīsū
‘I māmani mo hēvani. *
